definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: furnish with sandals, shoe (Targum [[נְעַל]] (rare), bind on sandal; Ar. na9ala furnish with sandals, shoe horse or camel; Syr. na9el shoe horse);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 S. sf. [[וׇאֶנְעֲלֵח]] [[תָָּחַשׁ]] Ez Eze 16:10 and I shod thee with [[תחשׁ]] (q. v.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. sf. [[וַיַּנְעִלוּם]] 2Ch 28:15 and gave them sandals.
